Title: Directs the commissioner of education to conduct a study of recess held in elementary schools in kindergarten through grade six
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to conduct a survey of recess held in public and charter schools serving students in kindergarten through grade six and to provide any information collected to the governor and the legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the commissioner of education to conduct a survey of recess held in schools serving students in kindergarten through grade six
